MS MCQs

    Simulate mouse and keyboard actions by using Power Automate Desktop

    »

    1. The Set Key State action refers to which keys?

      Alt, Control, Shift, Windows Key

      Caps Lock, Num Lock, Scroll Lock

      Mouse Buttons

      All of the above


    2. What is the role of the Tolerance field in the Move mouse to image action?

      Determines the degree to which an image found on the screen can differ from the one for which the action is searching.

      Determines the degree to which low-quality images can be compared to an image found on the screen.


    3. Which one of the following statements about the Move Mouse to Text on Screen action is true?

      It always moves the mouse to the first occurrence of the specified text on the screen.

      It can move the mouse to any occurrence of the specified text on the screen


    4. Which one of the following statements about the Move Mouse action is true?

      You can use images as a way to designate the point to which the mouse should move.

      You can use the current position of the mouse to designate the point to which the mouse should move.
